properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm; Columbia River Bar
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 21 at 9:28AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10
nm...
Columbia River Bar...
Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60
nm...

At 928 AM PST, Doppler radar indicated a large area of
thunderstorms, capable of producing winds to around 35 knots, half
inch hail and occasional cloud to water lightning. These
thunderstorms were located from near the Columbia River Bar to 10 nm
west of Cape Falcon to 22 nm west of Cape Lookout, moving northeast
at 30 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Camp Rilea, Clatsop Spit, Arch Cape, Cape Falcon, Warrenton, Columbia
River Bar, Cannon Beach, Tillamook Head and Seaside.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, and lightning strikes. Boaters should seek safe harbor
immediately until these storms pass.

NWSheadline: LARGE AREA OF THUNDERSTORMS APPROACHING THE NORTHWEST OREGON COAST
